events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection yesterday morning.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident description and keywords.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage the case and assist the customer through the next steps.
Acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the claimant confirming receipt and outlining the process ahead.
Request sent to the claimant for police reports, photographs of the vehicle damage, and witness statements as necessary documents.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including a detailed police report and several photos of the accident scene.
A thorough investigation has commenced to verify damage extent, liability, and validity of the claim information.
Investigation was completed with findings supporting the claimant’s account and confirming liable party for the collision.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on vehicle repair estimates and applicable coverage terms.
The claimant provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the settlement amount and the handling process.
The claim has been officially approved for payment following the claimant’s acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment was issued promptly to the claimant to cover repair costs as per the agreed settlement terms.
The claim was successfully closed after confirming the claimant received payment and no further issues were reported.
All documentation and correspondence related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
